data.name: Yusetsu
data.detailed_description:
Snow melting bar, melt the ice in your heart.
This is a warm love game, where you can enjoy a real Japanese bar love experience.
Players will play an emotionally frustrated character who, by chance, encounters Liquidambar, the owner of the Snowmelting Bar, who brings you into the bar. Since then, you have fallen in love with coming to the bar to pour out your thoughts and slowly heal your soul.

The game is a casual game, click on the dialogue to continue the plot.
In the evening, you can go to the bar, choose the girl you like, invite the girl to drink, and choose the drink that the girl likes, which can greatly improve the girl's favorability and unlock more plots and interactions.
Girls have limited chat time, which can be extended by paying.
You can choose to work during the day, complete easy work or hard work, and hard work can earn more gold coins.
Come and fall in love!

Game contains:
· Rich interactive experience
The game provides dynamic vertical drawings supported by Live2D technology, including three characters with different personalities. You can interact with the characters by clicking, or invite the characters to drink, play games, etc. to trigger random plots.
· Random interactive feedback
In order to make the character of the second dimension more realistic, the character has more than 50 kinds of random feedback and lines
·Multiple endings
The game contains a variety of endings, spend more money on the girl you like to unlock the corresponding ending.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows7/8/10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 400 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA Gef
  • Storage: 400 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 11 Sound Device

content_descriptors.notes: Please note that the background theme of the game is a bar, and there is drinking behavior in the game.
